title: geometric sans
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054725im_/http:/typophile.com/files/RATE_5118.jpg)
  
Sorry the sample's so rough.  
I just can't find a typeface with combo of the R leg/shape and the A coming to a point.  
Thanks!

Font: 

 Celias (closest) 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054725/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| --- | --- |
| [RATE.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054725/http:/typophile.com/files/RATE.jpg) | 19.92 KB |
author: monmeehan

comments.content:
Type Face Seven from Font Bureau has the RATE you seek

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-typeface-6-and-7/seven/glyphs.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054725/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-typeface-6-and-7/seven/glyphs.html "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-typeface-6-and-7/seven/glyphs.html")

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054725im_/http:/typophile.com/files/RATE_Celias_3555.png)
  
Imma give the win to Celias from Ryuk — I like the overall proportions best for the R.  
Lots of other good suggestions, though … especially with the bad sample.  
Thanks!

Thanks for crediting me but I'm pretty convinced Bob did the closest suggestion (even matching to me) with [FF Typeface Seven](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054725/http:/myfonts.us/td-ic8HR7) but it has to be set using lowercases only. Lowercase letter widths are different from uppercase.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054725im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_5893.png)
